sub_title: Sales Manager at HYDRO LEDUC B.V.
summary:
A highly motivated, strategically focused senior Sales and Marketing professional with over 20 year’s experience of delivering on-target B2B sales. P&L revenue and profit growth achieved either through detailed key account management or strategic new business development. By nature a consultative sales “hunter” generating customer value by offering the features and benefits of technically superior product portfolios, engineered solutions or commercial packages. Effective at networking and influencing decisions made by user engineers to board members in Asia, Europe and the USA, direct to the OEM or through distributor or agency channels. Combined with a clear understanding of modern marketing strategy and techniques gained from working for industrial and automotive manufacturers but also at global multinational organizations. 

Specialties: 
Board level sales and marketing strategy development, 
Key account management and new business development
New product development to meet defined market needs whilst enhancing the P&L
Direct OEM, distributor and agent channel management and business development
Leading, mentoring and motivating a professional sales team as Sales and Marketing Manager managing with concise planning, budgeting and forecasting skills
Project management of significant bids

Branch experience

Automotive, Railway, Steel, Metal products, Hydraulic damper and buffers, hydraulic components.

International experience in Asia, Europe, South-America and USA
